trans-unit.source: Defines the constraints set on a certificate.
trans-unit.target: Definerer begrensninger som er angitt for et sertifikat.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: This class provides properties that define the basic constraints set on a certificate.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen gir egenskaper som definerer begrensninger for grunnleggende angitt for et sertifikat.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509BasicConstraintsExtension"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509BasicConstraintsExtension"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509BasicConstraintsExtension"></xref> class using an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object and a value that identifies whether the extension is critical.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509BasicConstraintsExtension"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av en <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"> </xref> objekt og en verdi som angir om utvidelsen er kritiske.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor if the information to create an extension is already in an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren Hvis informasjonen til å opprette filtypen er allerede i en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData>objektet.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData>

trans-unit.source: The encoded data to use to create the extension.
trans-unit.target: Kodet dataene som skal brukes til å opprette filtypen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the extension is critical; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis utvidelsen er kritiske; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509BasicConstraintsExtension"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509BasicConstraintsExtension"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Parameters specify a value that indicates whether a certificate is a certificate authority (CA) certificate, a value that indicates whether the certificate has a restriction on the number of path levels it allows, the number of levels allowed in a certificate's path, and a value that indicates whether the extension is critical.
trans-unit.target: Parameterne angi en verdi som angir om et sertifikat er et sertifikat sertifiseringsinstans sertifikat, en verdi som angir om sertifikatet har en begrensning på antallet nivåer som banen kan, antallet nivåer som er tillatt i en sertifikatbanen og en verdi som angir om filtypen er kritiske.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the certificate is a certificate authority (CA) certificate; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis sertifikatet sertifikat (CA) for sertifiseringsinstanser; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the certificate has a restriction on the number of path levels it allows; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis sertifikatet har en begrensning på antallet nivåer som banen kan; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of levels allowed in a certificate's path.
trans-unit.target: Antall nivåer som er tillatt i et sertifikat bane.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the extension is critical; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis utvidelsen er kritiske; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a certificate is a certificate authority (CA) certificate.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om et sertifikat er et sertifikat for sertifiseringsinstanser (CA).

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine if the certificate is a certificate authority (CA) certificate.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å fastslå om sertifikatet er et sertifikat for sertifiseringsinstanser (CA).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the certificate is a certificate authority (CA) certificate, otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis sertifikatet sertifikat (CA) for sertifiseringsinstanser, ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509BasicConstraintsExtension"></xref> class using an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509BasicConstraintsExtension"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av en <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor if the information to create an extension is already in an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren Hvis informasjonen til å opprette filtypen er allerede i en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData>objektet.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData>

trans-unit.source: The encoded data to use to create the extension.
trans-unit.target: Kodet dataene som skal brukes til å opprette filtypen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a certificate has a restriction on the number of path levels it allows.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om et sertifikat har en begrensning på antall bane som gjør det mulig.

trans-unit.source: A certificate issuer can restrict the number of levels in a certificate path.
trans-unit.target: En sertifikatutstederen kan begrense antall nivåer i et sertifikatbanen.

trans-unit.source: This property indicates whether the certificate has this restriction.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen angir om sertifikatet har denne begrensningen.

trans-unit.source: If this value is `true`, you can use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509BasicConstraintsExtension.PathLengthConstraint%2A> property to determine the number of levels allowed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne verdien er `true`, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509BasicConstraintsExtension.PathLengthConstraint%2A>til å fastslå hvor mange nivåer som er tillatt.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509BasicConstraintsExtension.PathLengthConstraint%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the certificate has a restriction on the number of path levels it allows, otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis sertifikatet har en begrensning på antall banen nivåer kan, ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The extension cannot be decoded.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke dekodes filtypen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of levels allowed in a certificate's path.
trans-unit.target: Henter antallet nivåer som er tillatt i et sertifikat bane.

trans-unit.source: If a certificate has a constraint on the number of path levels it allows, this property indicates how many levels are allowed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et sertifikat har en begrensning på antall banen nivåer det gjør, angir egenskapen hvor mange nivåer er tillatt.

trans-unit.source: An integer indicating the number of levels allowed in a certificate's path.
trans-unit.target: Et heltall som angir antallet nivåer som er tillatt i et sertifikat bane.

trans-unit.source: The extension cannot be decoded.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke dekodes filtypen.
